entry.title: N216 UKESM1
entry.content:
New capability in UKESM1 has been used to simulate surface ozone

Working with Luke Abraham, we set up a new version of UKESM1 to simulate surface ozone at a resolution of ∼60 km (0.83 x 0.56 degree) spatial scale. The movie shows hourly snapshots of the ozone field.
entry.summary: High time and spatial resolution simulations of surface ozone using UKESM1
